text:
A regexp pattern is compiled unnecessarily each time
SimpleLinkRewritingTransformer.startElement() is called:

    public void startElement(
        String uri,
        String name,
        String qname,
        Attributes attrs)
        throws SAXException {
        AttributesImpl newAttrs = null;

        [...]
        
        Pattern pattern =
            Pattern.compile(
                envelope.getContext()
                    + "/"
                    + envelope.getPublication().getId()
                    + "/"
                    + Publication.AUTHORING_AREA
                    + "(/[-a-zA-Z0-9_/]+?)(_[a-z][a-z])?\\.html");
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The SimpleLinkRewritingTransformer is deprecated and replaced by the
LinkRewritingTransformer.
